description: Elements of a full call number generated from the item or holding

callNumber.description: Effective Call Number is an identifier assigned to an item or its holding and associated with the item.

callNumberPrefix.description: Effective Call Number Prefix is the prefix of the identifier assigned to an item or its holding and associated with the item.

callNumberSuffix.description: Effective Call Number Suffix is the suffix of the identifier assigned to an item or its holding and associated with the item.
